channel.title: So you wanna get started in infosec
channel.description:
A super good article I found this morning.
tl;dr: try everything, be ready to learn, don't be discouraged and get your foot in the door _somwhere_. Security is a big field.
https://medium.freecodecamp.com/so-you-want-to-work-in-security-bc6c10157d23#.2mgr76st4
